item.title: *Why* is this blog?
item.description: Why is this blog? Hi there! I’ve been sitting on this domain ever since .dev domains got opened up to the public by Google. Having to pony up the yearly domain fee for the third time without actually doing anything with it is starting to get to me. So here we are. I don’t have a full idea of what I’m going to put here yet, but it’s probably going to include publicizing my learning efforts of:
